epic.description:
Implement HAIAMM Operations function practices to establish secure AI operations and incident response.

## Overview

The Operations function answers: *How do you run AI agents safely?*

## Practices Included

| Practice | Code | Purpose |
|----------|------|---------|
| Issue Management | IM | Track and remediate security issues |
| Environment Hardening | EH | Secure AI runtime environments |
| Monitoring & Logging | ML | Monitor AI systems for security events |

## Target Maturity

- [ ] Level 1: Foundation
- [ ] Level 2: Structured
- [ ] Level 3: Optimized

## Success Criteria

- Security issue tracking process operational
- AI environments hardened per standards
- Monitoring and alerting active
- Incident response procedures tested

## Key Risks Addressed

- ASI03: Identity & Privilege Abuse
- ASI08: Cascading Failures
- ASI10: Rogue Agents
- LLM03: Supply Chain
- LLM07: System Prompt Leakage
- LLM10: Unbounded Consumption

## References

- [HAIAMM Handbook](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/handbook/00-INDEX.md)
- [Incident Response Checklist](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/templates/checklists/incident-response-checklist.md)
- [Deployment Readiness Checklist](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/templates/checklists/deployment-readiness-checklist.md)
